# VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel.fast

**Case**

Fast text recognition returns results more quickly at the expense of accuracy.

## Declaration

```swift
case fast
```

## Recognition Levels

- **VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel.accurate**: Accurate text recognition takes more time to produce a more comprehensive result.
